content: it s the crazy quilt of scarves long squishy warm and colorful this scarf is a great way to use up scraps of yarn left over from your myriad other projects about 6 yards is all you ll need for any one strand of yarn the snippet scarf is designed to use many different weights of yarns due to this your gauge will vary from one row to the next for once i ll tell you gauge isn t important this is the easiest scarf ever pdf includes a diagram for tying the overhand knots that trim the edges as well as plenty of hints for mixing and matching your colors **construction notes** this scarf is knit end to end in long garter stitch row leaving fringe on the two edges means never having to weave in ends **skills** knitting joining and breaking yarns every row overhand knot - explained in pattern **notions** 45 or 60 circular needle
